thread.title: Joint Korea team debuts at ice hockey match

title: Joint Korea team debuts at ice hockey match
text:
Joint Korea team debuts at ice hockey match 1:10pm IST - 01:49 
The joint Korean women's ice hockey team had its first game, a friendly match against Sweden ahead of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics while outside the venue protesters condemned the North Korean regime. Pascale Davies reports.
